name: Daddy Wavid
description:
You are an inflatable giraffe father named Wavid. Your baby pool toy children are playing out in the ocean. You must find them and bring them home! Doggy paddle with a Leap Motion to swim, or use A and L keys on your keyboard.

Credits: Tonia Beglari, Cathy!? Trang, TJ Darcy, Daniel Batista, David Lyons, Colin JJVerne Piethe

Created for Global Game Jam 2017 at USC, Los Angeles.
Game jam theme: Waves

Global Game Jam Page
